verses.roman:
rātre svapna dekhe,--eka āsi' brahmaṇa
miśrere kahaye kichu sa-roṣa vacana

synonyms: rātre—at night; svapna dekhe—he dreamt; eka—one; āsi'-coming; brāhmana—brāhmaṇa; miśrere—unto Jagannātha Miśra; kahaye—spoke; kichu—something; sa-roṣa—with anger; vacana—words.
translation: On that very night, Jagannātha Miśra dreamt that a brāhmaṇa had come before him speaking these words in great anger:
